CRW_Baltia |guid = 3b6a48a5-f296-4184-aca6-1719c6107a76 }} '''Baltia''' is a character and recruitable [crew member](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireCrewMembers/) in {{poe2}}. ## Background {{Description|Her speech gets cut short as one of the vines about her midsection tightens its hold, nearly forcing the breath from her lungs. Gritting her teeth, she braces against the vines and fights to steal back some breathing room.}} Baltia is the sole surviving member of an ill-fated expedition to Motare. After her own expedition was wiped out, she was attacked and trapped by particularly aggressive vines that took and constricted her. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = |none = |other = * You can save her if you are a Druid, by communing with the vines. [Tekehu](/tekehu/) can also help by denying water to the vines. After that she becomes a recruitable crew member. * You can also save her with Might 16 in your party. * During [The Last Sanctuary](/theLastSanctuary/) if you don't let her notice you (she cries out "Help me! . . . please!") then you can return later to save her when you have a druid or Might 16 in your party, |crew = {{crewrank|2|cannoneer}}
Personality: Loyal }} ## Gallery portrait_baltia_sm.png | Baltia's crew portrait {{Crew navbar PoE2}} [Category:Motare o Kōzi characters](/categoryMotareOKoziCharacters/)
